title: Revengeful Deceptions
description: When her husband and son get killed in a hit and run accident, Dominique Greenway loses everything. She decides to leave rural New Hampshire and take up residence in Boston where she can better exact her revenge on every single person responsible for ruining her life- and she's going to enjoy each and every moment of it. In an atmosphere thick with deceit, desire, and mistrust Dominique becomes torn between the need to safeguard her heart and the urge to seek revenge.
author: Ursula Dukes
